gui.autowalk.title: Auto Walking
autowalk.config.show_hud.comment: Whether show message horizontally centered on the screen when auto walking.
autowalk.config.hud_offset_y.comment: The vertical offset from the top of the screen.
autowalk.config.auto_jump.comment:
When set to true, player can auto jump when auto walking.
When set to false, it will depend on the vanilla settings.
